short.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G: Translates statist words and phrases of webpages

long.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G:
What would the web look like if the language was not colored by statism?

This plugin attempts to translate statist words and phrases. English only. Try it on websites such as news sites, Wikipedia, etc. Disable the extension when (if?) you want to go back to statist language.
